description: Enumerated list of valid M-01 Mutation Types, used for prioritization and routing during GSEP Stage 1 Vetting.

mutation_types.description: Mitigation of immediate security vulnerabilities. Highest priority.
Critical correction of identified bugs or failure modes.
Optimization focusing on reducing resource consumption (compute, memory, I/O) or improving latency.
Introduction of new components, features, or architectural changes.
Internal code restructuring solely to improve maintainability or readability.
Changes related to data persistence or schema updates.
